scripts.test: npm run test:fork && npm run test:local
scripts.coverage: source .env && forge coverage --fork-url polygon --report lcov && lcov --remove lcov.info 'test/*' 'script/*' --output-file lcov.info --rc lcov_branch_coverage=1 && genhtml lcov.info -o report --branch-coverage && open report/index.html
scripts.deploy:polygon: source .env && export ENV=PRO && forge script script/deployment/DeployPolygon.s.sol:DeployPolygon --ffi --rpc-url polygon --private-key ${PRIVATE_KEY} --broadcast --slow -vvvv --verify --chain polygon
scripts.deploy:sepolia:dev: source .env && export ENV=DEV && forge script script/deployment/DeploySepoliaDEV.s.sol:DeploySepoliaDEV --ffi --rpc-url sepolia --private-key ${PRIVATE_KEY} --broadcast --slow -vvvv --verify --chain sepolia
scripts.deploy:sepolia:sta: source .env && export ENV=STA && forge script script/deployment/DeploySepoliaSTA.s.sol:DeploySepoliaSTA --ffi --rpc-url sepolia --private-key ${PRIVATE_KEY} --broadcast --slow -vvvv --verify --chain sepolia
scripts.deploy:sepolia:int: source .env && export ENV=INT && forge script script/deployment/DeploySepoliaINT.s.sol:DeploySepoliaINT --ffi --rpc-url sepolia --private-key ${PRIVATE_KEY} --broadcast --slow -vvvv --verify --chain sepolia
scripts.deploy:counter:impl:polygon: source .env && export ENV=PRO && forge script script/single-deployments/Counter.s.sol:DeployCounterImplementation --ffi --rpc-url polygon --private-key ${PRIVATE_KEY} --broadcast --slow -vvvv --verify --chain polygon
scripts.deploy:counter:proxy:polygon: source .env && export ENV=PRO && forge script script/single-deployments/Counter.s.sol:DeployCounterProxy --ffi --rpc-url polygon --private-key ${PRIVATE_KEY} --broadcast --slow -vvvv --verify --chain polygon
scripts.diff-storage-etherscan:contract: source .env && cast etherscan-source --chain polygon -d etherscan <address> && forge inspect src/Contract.sol:Contract storage --pretty >> imp1.txt && forge inspect etherscan/Contract/src/Contract.sol:Contract storage --pretty >> imp2.txt && rm -rf etherscan/ && git diff --word-diff=color --word-diff-regex=. --no-index imp1.txt imp2.txt && rm imp1.txt && rm imp2.txt
